about_the_game:
*********************Gameplay********************

Players need to change all the ground to green within the specified number of times.

Each level will have a special shape provided to the player, and the player needs to make full use of the shape provided by the game to change the color of the ground.

*********************Game Control********************

The game only needs the mouse to click the correct position.

*********************Game Features********************

>> Easy to learn, simple mouse controls

>>Very suitable for relaxing yourself after a heavy game

>> Some logical thinking challenge, but not overly complex

*I used Google Translate, it may not be standard, but I hope you can understand what I want to express
detailed_description:
*********************Gameplay********************

Players need to change all the ground to green within the specified number of times.

Each level will have a special shape provided to the player, and the player needs to make full use of the shape provided by the game to change the color of the ground.

*********************Game Control********************

The game only needs the mouse to click the correct position.

*********************Game Features********************

>> Easy to learn, simple mouse controls

>>Very suitable for relaxing yourself after a heavy game

>> Some logical thinking challenge, but not overly complex

*I used Google Translate, it may not be standard, but I hope you can understand what I want to express

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: MindBloc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If your specs aren't high enough to play this game, you should really consider saving your money and buying a new computer. A decision like that would greatly improve your life in many aspects rather than the couple hours enjoyment you may get from my game. Or whatever, it's your money ;)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Octa Core+ (I am just assuming Octa means 8)
  • Memory: 7 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2x GTX 1080 TI (unless you can have more, then by all means)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 501 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: I often wonder if a sound card would make my garbage sounds any better. If I didn't get the sounds from a royalty free site, I just recorded weird sounds and then used a free program to slightly modify them so they sounded less like a dude making strange sounds.

short_description: MindBloc is a puzzle game that tests the player's logical ability, perfect for relaxing, or playing while your computer is loading another game.
